text: @SethAbramson I’m just a regular citizen who’s a news junkie & I kept my eye on the news coming out of China when the Coronavirus hit them hard & then started spreading, especially in Italy. It was apparent to me we needed to prepare but Trump thought the China ban was enough to stop it-wrong.
